Uses of Package
alethinophidia.game

  • Packages that use alethinophidia.game 
    Package Description
    alethinophidia.game  
    alethinophidia.map  
    alethinophidia.pawns  
    alethinophidia.userInterface  
    alethinophidia.utils  
  • Classes in alethinophidia.game used by alethinophidia.game 
    Class and Description
    GameLoopThread
    Main game loop, created as an additional thread controlled by GameView class
    GamePlayGenerator
    Main game play manager, that creates and controls game play elements such as SnakeCareCenter, ItemFactory, MapGrid and CollisionSolver.
    GameView
    GameView is the main Manager of entire app.
    IntroGenerator
    class solely created for the purpose of including intro sequence at the start of the app.
    MenuGenerator
    Main control center of in game menus (except for InGameInterface).
    SoundGenerator
    currently WIP
  • Classes in alethinophidia.game used by alethinophidia.map

    GameView
    GameView is the main Manager of entire app.
